{"id":1085240714,"question_id":3165,"lang":"c","lang_name":"C","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1698396863,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1085240714/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Indices With Index and Value Difference I","memory":"6.6 MB","code":"/**\n * Note: The returned array must be malloced, assume caller calls free().\n */\nint* findIndices(int* nums, int numsSize, int indexDifference, int valueDifference, int* returnSize) {\n    \n    int* res = (int*) malloc(2 * sizeof(int));\n    *returnSize = 2;\n\n    for (int i=0; i<numsSize - indexDifference; i++){\n\n        for (int j = i + indexDifference; j<numsSize; j++){\n\n            int diff = nums[i] - nums[j];\n            if (diff < 0){\n                diff = -diff;\n            }\n\n            if (diff >= valueDifference){\n                res[0] = i;\n                res[1] = j;\n                return res;\n            }\n\n        }\n\n    }\n\n    res[0] = -1;\n    res[1] = -1;\n    return res;\n\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-indices-with-index-and-value-difference-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
